name: Monitor Speech Development
content: Keep track of Robin's progress in speech development. Provide extra support and encouragement during speech-related activities.
image_prompt: Create an icon for the following care plan item with a digital animation style with a vibrant, child-friendly aesthetic. A speech bubble with a small child talking.
url: /api/openai/image?prompt=Create an icon for the following care plan item with a digital animation style with a vibrant, child-friendly aesthetic. A speech bubble with a small child talking.

name: Speech Therapy Sessions
content: Schedule speech therapy sessions for Robin to help with speech delay.
image_prompt: Create an icon for the following care plan item in a friendly, animated style. A speech therapist engaging with a child.
url: /api/openai/image?prompt=Create an icon for the following care plan item in a friendly, animated style. A speech therapist engaging with a child.

name: Immunization Updates
content: Check with your healthcare provider to update the pending immunizations for Robin.

name: Introduce New Foods
content: Gradually introduce new foods to Robin's diet to ensure nutritional balance and monitor for any allergic reactions.

name: Monitor Dietary Reactions
content: Keep a log of Robin's reactions to new foods and adjust diet accordingly.

url: /api/openai/image?prompt=Create an icon for the following care plan item with a vibrant, digital animation style. A notebook with food images and reaction emojis.

name: Physical Coordination Activities
content: Engage Robin in activities like playing catch or building blocks to help with physical coordination.

content: Arrange playdates or group activities to enhance Robin's social interaction skills.

content: Document and review Robin's milestones to ensure progress is on track.

name: Read Books Together
content: Spend time reading books together with Robin to enhance language development and bonding.
